website_summaries.verdict: A good option if you have a half-patio umbrella and you want a base that will sit flush against the wall.
pros: Houses umbrella poles from 1.25 to almost 2 inches in diameter
Compact, so it fits easily in small spaces
cons: Only weighs 20 pounds, so it won't do well against heavy winds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Almost 😆
customer_reviews.text: This weighs about 20 lbs and it’s perfect. Read reviews and as we’ve done on very windy days, close the umbrella. Although, because it’s against my home, it really does feel and looks secure. We have not had any problems at all. Perfect with our Sundale umbrella. 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼 UPDATE 4/30/2018 We had alittle snow and it toppled over. Purchased a two piece bag weight (filled it with sand). Now it’s very secure and.....perfect, again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, works excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works great on our half umbrella. It saved it from going over our 4th floor balcony when I forgot to close it and it became weighed down with ice/snow. It toppled right over the side, but stopped due to the heavy base. A lighter base would have let it go over and crash down to the ground. Also works great for sudden winds. It also has added hardware that allows you to anchor the umbrella to the floor through the bottom of the base. Just be sure to leave some room for ice expansion if it will freeze in winter.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: this base is pretty good, HOWEVER
customer_reviews.text: As a base for my half-umbrella, this base is pretty good, HOWEVER, the knob-style tightener that holds the umbrella shaft in the base is inadequate to keep the umbrella staff in the base during windy days or nights. I've used eye-bolts and plastic ties to keep the umbrella in place and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: GruffOldBear

customer_reviews.title: A very good base for umbrella or fan!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to support a fan with a broken base. It works perfect. If you are using it on hardwood floors or the floors that may scratch be sure to have three adhesive cushion pads to put on the bottom. The product is well made and works to our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: P C Z

customer_reviews.title: LEANING  PATIO UMBRELLA!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stand with the pure garden 9 ft half round patio umbrella for this summer. I am so disappointed in this product. It worked well for the first month then it started leaning forward. I contacted Amazon as suggested i drlled a hole into the poll that goes into the screw in the umbrella base to no avail. Now it has bern suggested that i put wooden shimmies in the base. Should I have to work this hard to enjoy the product!!??i solved the problem a friend gave me a round an iron base. voila..no tilting umbrella!!.please advise your customer to buy metal base instead of resin.
customer_reviews.author: Frances C.

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella base
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my back patio in part to keep the water off of the back door. I needed something that would snuggle up to the backside of my condo because there's so much wrong with the structure of my back door that it leaks when it rains heavy. So far, so good. I haven't noticed any leaks and it's an extra perk to be able to sit outside and drink your coffee while it's raining.
customer_reviews.author: Betybobety

customer_reviews.title: Can’t recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy. I had to put a sand bag on the base to keep it up. The first wind knocked it over. I’ve had it eight months now and the whole pole broke off the stand today . Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but a bit of a lean
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella stand is sturdy and holds our half umbrella without the need for extra weight, however as others have noted, it does lean a little bit forwards. For us that's not an issue as there's a bit of a lip on our roof, but can easily see that being a problem for others.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: ... is not very heavy at all and blows over easily with the half umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It is not very heavy at all and blows over easily with the half umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: LittleDevil

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with the half umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is not strong enough to support a half umbrella. I bought the stand according to the size of the umbrella but it is too weak.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Not secure
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this and the paint is already chipped, cracked and coming off.. also the lever to tighten doesnt hold the umbrella in very well, stays loose and lets the umbrella wobble. Not really a fan of this and need to get a new one to allow a more secure base.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This half base is very nice. It's heavy and well made with a nice design on the version I bought. It's great to not have to fill it up with sand or worry about rust. I'm really happy with it, well worth the money. Photo included.
customer_reviews.author: Carols Critters

customer_reviews.title: Half Umbrella Stand
customer_reviews.text: I liked this stand so much I actually purchased a second one. Used one for our half patio umbrella and the other to hold up the pole holding my hummingbird feeder. Looks great and doesn't take up much room. S
customer_reviews.author: E D & S

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel knocks it over!
customer_reviews.text: Thought half round would work with half umbrella, but the full round would very likely be more stable. If a squirrel can knock it over so can wind.
customer_reviews.author: Sallie50

customer_reviews.title: Not that good.
customer_reviews.text: Knocks over very easily. A bird landed on top of the umbrella and it fell over taking the table with it. A wk later with the umbrella down, it was fairly windy and it fell over again. Full round base would be much better.
customer_reviews.author: Ccpromua

customer_reviews.title: The turning knob to hold the pole
customer_reviews.text: My umbrella looks nice and sturdy, but the base where you screw in to hold the pole didn't screw in straight and when turning the knob the plastic piece attached to the base started to come apart. The screw was going in on an angle. It wasn't welded too good. So far It seems to be holding my umbrella pole up. Be careful when screwing in as it could break apart.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality and very pretty too.
customer_reviews.text: We shopped for weeks before choosing this base for our half patio umbrella. I actually chose another and something happened where I changed to this one. It was not a mistake. This is beautifully made and very high quality. If we get a second umbrella I will definitely choose this one again.
customer_reviews.author: AReviewer.of.online.Products

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and Holding in place our beautiful umbrella:)
customer_reviews.text: This is a HEAVY half moon base and it is awesome!!! Holds the umbrella in spot during the down pours of drenching rain and wind. Super impressed and it is really beautiful. Very, very pleases!
customer_reviews.author: Hiker68

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: You’ll need to purchase this when you buy the half umbrella. It does the job, so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tressy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The base is very pretty and heavy. That surprised me I must admit. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my porch umbrella. I just wish it had been cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon U

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy at All
customer_reviews.text: this thing will never hold up the umbrella, I had to tighten the stem twice already, save your money
customer_reviews.author: Dugan

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the stand! Easy to put together and dimensions where accurate. I ordered a second one for our side yard. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: carol jarrett hanover

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy enough
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and it fits perfectly in the space I wanted it for. But it’s not nearly heavy enough to hold an umbrella in place. Had to chase down my umbrella multiple times in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Cinthia

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella stand is perfect! I thought it would be light weight and unable to hold the umbrella down in the wind but it is heavy duty. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin P.

customer_reviews.title: Buy plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Completely rusted through in two summers. Umbrella fell in pool
customer_reviews.author: Easy way

customer_reviews.title: Totally Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for my new umbrella. Fits perfect and very heavy. The design makes it much more enjoyable! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: HIREP

customer_reviews.title: I'm happy with it but I did buy inflatable weights (which ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I'm happy with it but I did buy inflatable weights (which makes the look ugly) to be sure if some winds came it wouldn't move or tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: It has weathered the storm
customer_reviews.text: This hasn't moved since I put it on for my half patio umbrella and my umbrella has held up during all weather conditions, thunderstorms, windy rain, snow, etc.
customer_reviews.author: T. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Half a base and study as whole
customer_reviews.text: The designed on base is attractive The base is sturdy and heavy. It will hold a whole umbrella, too.
customer_reviews.author: Yolie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: This works great! Holds umbrella in place and very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Johnelle

customer_reviews.title: Great with back at a fence or even home
customer_reviews.text: Recommend sandbag or something to keep the base from moving IF high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy H.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This half umbrella stand works perfectly as it abuts very close to the window and supports my half-umbrella well.
customer_reviews.author: PGF

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was more weight to this Umbrella stand. Need to place bricks or umbrella support to wall to prevent a half umbrella from toppling over
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for half umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It is a heavy base, perfect for the half umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Tjornhom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing with the water weight and screws to hold umbrella, it really works
customer_reviews.text: Definitely had never heard of the half umbrella or stand. Love this, it fits against the wall and has two screws to hold the umbrella in tight. As well as being able to fill the holder with water, the wind has not lifted it. Amazed that it’s staying in place when windy
customer_reviews.author: M. Morton

customer_reviews.title: its very nice, but not that heavy
customer_reviews.text: its very nice, but not that heavy. I needed to tie it to the balusters in order to stop a heavy wind
customer_reviews.author: handygirl

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. Be sure to NOT drop it; for it may crack. It is NOT metal, but a heavy resin.
customer_reviews.author: A Natural Touch

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for 1/2 size umbrella!!
customer_reviews.text: This stand has been great for the place I needed to use it. It's the perfect size and is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Base
customer_reviews.text: Great base for the price. It worked perfectly to solve our situation - a half umbrella to shade an orchid box from the midday sun.
customer_reviews.author: Florida shopper

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Hold an umbrella securely during our last round of high winds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaning Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This is kinda cheesy, but I guess you get what you pay for. The tube that holds the umbrella pole, is not stable and does not connect well with the hardware it comes with, hence the umbrella leans.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get any better!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to set up! Quality construction - perfect match with my half umbrella! My patio is ready for summer!
customer_reviews.author: cmecoach

customer_reviews.title: i like it was a bit wind last night and i ...
customer_reviews.text: i like it was a bit wind last night and i forgot to put the umbrella down. but the wind did not take it fir a for this time great product

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep umbrella up!
customer_reviews.text: If I could have use a minus I would havterrible stand For balance I think it needs a full circle stand

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It is almost perfect for what I needed, I just wish there as a little more weight to it
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Had to move to a apartment & this along with half shade is PERFECT!!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty short tube.
customer_reviews.text: The tube that holds the umbrella is to short, What makes the umbrella be inclined.

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: disappointed of this bad product not a month lasted money thrown in the trash the truth I do not recommend if I could give it back
customer_reviews.author: edismenjivar

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and very compact compared to the other heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and very compact compared to the other heavy umbrella bases. I have a troubled wrist, so being able to carry it around after emptying the water out is a big plus. I can store it easily. Also it stays very strong against the heavy winds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, heavy and fits great with our 1/2 umbrella. We have sit right up against our house on our deck between two chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift to my Mom♡
customer_reviews.text: Has a good weight to it. And holds the umbrella well. Thanks♡

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Well made, good looking, fits well, light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Seungyong Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy for a little stand.
customer_reviews.text: I use this stand with a half round umbrella up by my spa. Works well and hasn’t tipped over yet.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great stand. nice design and my umbrella never tips over.

customer_reviews.title: Works well on my patio
customer_reviews.text: Works well with the half umbrella which I purchased earlier. Fits nicely against house and allows for half umbrella to fit snugly above doorway.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for the half umbrella
customer_reviews.text: perfect for the half umbrella holds it up fairly securely when place right up against the house... easy to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to put up against the fence or house. Sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella base
customer_reviews.text: Good resin quality with the look of antique. Very heavy so my flag stays put!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Well made piece
customer_reviews.text: Super nice on my balcony. Very sturdy, well holding my umbrella even on some of the strong windy days. Extremely well made piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: STURDY STAND
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews and chose this half umbrella stand. No regrets!!! It is sturdy and I've had no issues at all. It has been through several storms on patio with no problems . Highly recommend. Shipped quicker than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Love

customer_reviews.title: There was no knob provided with this.
customer_reviews.text: Missing one of the main parts of the stand, no customer service info provided.

customer_reviews.title: love this! bought this and the Half Patio umbrella ...
customer_reviews.text: love this! bought this and the Half Patio umbrella for my very sunny deck. Both items totaled what it would have cost to purchase the just the umbrella from a catalog store. thank you!

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I have a semi-circle umbrella; this heavy base fits it and is sturdy. Highly recommend it with a "half" umbrella.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was as nice as it looks like in the photo!

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Works just right where we need it on a long narrow deck. Liked it so well that we purchased another to put on the other side of the sliding doors.

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Strong and sturdy. Now I wish I had the half umbrella I need to go into it.

customer_reviews.title: Holder is not strong enough to hold closed umbrella and pole upright in wind.

customer_reviews.title: It's a gotta have...

customer_reviews.title: Base angle to neck was not straight. Had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Base angle to neck was not straight. Had to insert washers in between the two, in order to be at right angle so pole would not be leaning back.

customer_reviews.title: a great choice
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is heavy and durable .. a great choice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent

customer_reviews.title: and was easy to set up

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella blows over too easy in the wind. I will be purchasing a full round stand. This was a complete waste of money. Unfortunately I threw the box away or I would be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for the application. Even stable in fairly high winds. Looks very nice and not in any way cheap. Great deal for the money

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fine with the umbrella I ordered, very heavy, doesn't move easily.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold umbrella straight
customer_reviews.text: I disliked very much that this base did not support my half umbrella sufficiently enough that it would stand straight up. It is important that it is straight so that it sits flush against my slider window. I tried to contact Sundale several times by phone and email and they have not responded. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoanlace

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a JOKE!!! It has ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a JOKE!!! It has to be, it's round on the bottom it can barely hold it's self up. Let alone an umbrella it tips right over. Jokes on me that's for sure. Now I get to return it. What a Joke did I say that before. Update: So today 8-1-19 The seller Sundale offered me 40 dollars to remove this review and I say no way to that, I'm not a sell out. I stand by my review 100% this thing was Junk 100% and now Sundale is a Joke. For trying to buy me off shame shame on you just a joke. You sold me junk so this is what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy enough sustain summer breeze...
customer_reviews.text: Almost flew out of my balcony on the 6th floor. Wish I could return it. 9/4/18 UPDATE: Changing from 1 star to 3 star as the seller contacted us and refunded us after we provided a photo of defective product.

product_meta.title: Sundale Outdoor Half Round Universal Heavy Duty Plastic Water Sand Patio Half Round Umbrella Base Stand, Black
feature_bullets: Umbrella Stand Dimension: 11.8"(W) x 19.2"(L) x 7.1"(H), Pole Length 8.5"
Weights 40 lbs when fully filled with water
Easy to clean and store and fill spout
UV protected to prevent fading , water and weather Resistant
Constructed of heavy-duty plastic for lasting quality, All hardware and tools included, Assembly in seconds
